name: Cheb Mami
description: '''Mohamed Khelifati''' ({{langx|ar|محمد خليفاتي|Muḥammad Khalīfātī}}; born 11 July 1966), better known by his [[stage name]] '''Cheb Mami''' ({{langx|ar|شاب مامي|shābb māmī|label=none}}), is an [[Algerians|Algerian]] musician and singer-songwriter. He sings and speaks in [[Algerian Arabic]] and sometimes in [[Mashriqi Arabic|Eastern Arabic dialects]] or in French. Internationally, he is known for contributing vocals to the 1999 [[Sting (musician)|Sting]] single "[[Desert Rose (Sting song)|Desert Rose]]".
